### The Doubly Standardized Concavex Curve

$$ \frac{\left( \frac{1-\lambda}{2} \right)^2 + \lambda}    { \left( \frac{1-\lambda}{2} \right)^2        +\lambda x} \cdot x  $$


```{r echo = FALSE}
ccx <- function(lambda,x) ((((1-lambda)/2)^2+lambda)/(((1-lambda)/2)^2+lambda*x))*x

par(pty="s")
x<-seq(0,1,len=1000)
y<-ccx(lambda= -0.5,x=x)
plot(0,0,type="n",xlab="Dose",ylab="Response",
     xlim=c(0,1),ylim=c(0,1),axes=FALSE)
abline(h=seq(0,1,by=0.1),v=seq(0,1,by=0.1),lty=2,col="gray")
abline(0,1,lty=1,lwd=2,col="black")
abline(1,-1,lty=1,lwd=2,col="black")
lines(x,y,lty=1,lwd=3,col="black")
axis(1)
axis(2)
box()
```
